alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 3:56PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN EAST CARROLL AND MADISON PARISHES...CENTRAL WARREN AND SOUTHERN ISSAQUENA COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CST... At 356 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tendal, or 9 miles southwest of Tallulah, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tallulah around 400 PM CST. Mansford and Afton around 405 PM CST. Mound around 410 PM CST. Vicksburg around 420 PM CST. Bovina and Redwood around 430 PM CST. Oak Ridge around 435 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Delta and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for west central Mississippi.
